Reviews.Title: really great
Reviews.Author: luke
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of these and wish I bought more. The sound is really strong compared with other tv's this size.  It is too bad not available new but at used it is still better than most new ones.

Reviews.Title: WORKS GREAT - JUST WHAT WE NEEDED
Reviews.Author: celia
Reviews.Content: WORKS GREAT - JUST WHAT WE NEEDEDPURCHASED @ THE END OF '09 -PRICE UNDER $400 WITH COUPONSTILL GOING STRONG. FANTASTIC SOUNDTONS OF INPUTS/HOOKUPSWONDERFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM HITACHITOO BAD NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORENEXT TV DEFINITELY WILL BE FROM HITACHI

ProductInfo.Features:
7 high definition inputs
Convenient swivel stand
ProductInfo.Name: Hitachi L32A403 32in LCD HDTV 720p
